loginDescription: Sign in easily and create your own recipes

characters.title: Done with one video!
characters.description:
Just paste a YouTube link
and get a recipe in 30 seconds

characters.title: Dirty hands? No problem
characters.description:
Just say "next step"
to cook without touching

characters.title: Voice-controlled timer
characters.description:
Say "timer 3 minutes"
and it starts automatically

webBrowserNotice.title: Web Browser Feature
webBrowserNotice.description: Download our mobile app for a better experience. Enjoy more features like voice recognition and push notifications.
